data_fetch_tools.description: Retrieves monthly adjusted OHLC and volume for a global equity.

inputs.apikey (optional): Override API key. Default is null.
inputs.datatype (optional): Return format. Only 'json' is supported. Default is 'json'.

data_fetch_tools.description: Retrieves company overview and fundamental data for a given symbol.

inputs.apikey (optional): Override API key. Default is null.

data_fetch_tools.description: Fetches live and historical market news & sentiment.

inputs.limit (optional): Maximum number of articles to return (1-1000). Default is 50.
inputs.sort (optional): Sort order for articles ('LATEST', 'EARLIEST', or 'RELEVANCE'). Default is 'LATEST'.
inputs.time_from (optional): Start of time range (inclusive) in YYYYMMDDTHHMM format.
inputs.time_to (optional): End of time range (inclusive) in YYYYMMDDTHHMM format. Default is current time.
inputs.topics (optional): List of topics to filter articles.

analysis_plan.name: price_trend_analysis
analysis_plan.description: Evaluate trailing price momentum and volatility for AAPL using monthly adjusted closes.

analysis_plan.name: profitability_snapshot
analysis_plan.description: Extract current profitability ratios from company overview.

analysis_plan.name: sentiment_monitor
analysis_plan.description: Summarize Alpha Vantage news sentiment feed.
